text: The Asian Electronic Sports Federation (AESF) is the governing body of Esports in Asia and recognized by Olympic Council of Asia. ==Members== So far, there are 45 member nations in AESF:Recognised members Asian Electronic Sports Federation {|class="wikitable sortable hlist" style="text-align:center; font- size:100%;" !
